headline: Palantir Surges on First $1 Billion Revenue Quarter
summary: Palantir Technologies  reported 53% growth in earnings from U.S. government contracts in its second-quarter earnings, the latest sign that the company is getting a boost from the Trump administration’s push to hasten adoption of AI technology.  The gains underscore Palantir’s momentum as corporations and militaries around the world invest at a frenetic pace in artificial-intelligence tools.  Palantir recorded a second-quarter net profit of $326.7 million, more than double its gain of a year ago.

The gains underscore Palantir’s momentum as corporations and militaries around the world invest at a frenetic pace in artificial-intelligence tools.  Palantir recorded a second-quarter net profit of $326.7 million, more than double its gain of a year ago.

headline: Palantir's Army deal, ON Semi earnings, Opendoor jumps
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman tracks Monday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Palantir (PLTR) stock is rising ahead of earnings, fueled by a $10 billion Army contract and a 500% stock surge over the past year. ON Semiconductor (ON) stock slips after its second quarter results met expectations, with management citing signs of market stabilization. Opendoor (OPEN) stock jumps as retail investors eye the company's earnings results on Tuesday. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: McDonald’s Earnings, New Tariff Deadline, PMIs: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season marches on, with results from Walt Disney and McDonald’s among this week's highlights, along with President Trump's new tariff-hike deadline for many countries. Trump also said he would name replacements this week for Federal Reserve governor Adriana Kugler and Bureau of Labor Statistics chief Erika McEntarfer.
